Proxy.name: DataWriterBase
Proxy.Documentation: This defines the interface for legacy vtk data files writer.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The type for the data file (i.e. ascii or binary).

Proxy.name: ParallelWriterBase
Proxy.Documentation: This defines the interface for the parallel writers.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: GhostLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of ghost levels to include in the output file(s). Note that some writers (such as ExodusIIWriter) may not support writing ghost levels.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.label: Write timesteps as file-series
IntVectorProperty.name: WriteTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When WriteTimeSteps is OFF, the writer writes only the current timestep. Otherwise it is called once for each time step within the min and max range. If those are not set, the writer is called for all time steps available in its input.

IntVectorProperty.label: First time step
IntVectorProperty.name: MinTimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the lower bound for timesteps to write.

IntVectorProperty.label: Last time step
IntVectorProperty.name: MaxTimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the upper bound for timesteps to write. If less than min, the last time step is used.

IntVectorProperty.label: Time step stride
IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStepStride
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the stride to go through the time steps.

StringVectorProperty.label: File name suffix
StringVectorProperty.name: FileNameSuffix
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The suffix to append to the file name when writing files at different timesteps. (File extensions such as .vtk should be excluded.) The % format specifiers are used. For example, _%d will write files as FileName_0, FileName_1, FileName_2, etc., and _%.3d will write files as FileName_000, FileName_001, FileName_002 etc.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.label: Write all timesteps as file-series
IntVectorProperty.name: WriteTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When WriteTimeSteps is turned ON, the writer is executed once for each timestep available from its input.

Documentation.short_help: Write polygonal data in Stanford University PLY format.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableColoring
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether color information should be saved in the PLY file. If enable, the data source's coloring state i.e. the array to color with and the transfer function from the active view will be used.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The array that will be used for saving color information when **Enable Coloring** is ON.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup table to use for scalar mapping.

Proxy.name: DataSetWriterCore
Proxy.Documentation: Internal proxy used for writing legacy vtk files.

Proxy.name: XMLDataSetWriterCore
Proxy.Documentation: Internal writer for writing xml-based vtk files.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The mode uses for writing the file's data i.e. ascii, binary, appended binary.

IntVectorProperty.name: HeaderType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the binary data header word type. The default is UInt32. Set to UInt64 when storing arrays requiring 64-bit indexing.

IntVectorProperty.name: EncodeAppendedData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When EncodeAppendedData is turned ON, the writer uses base64 encoding when writing binary data (only if appended mode is selected).

IntVectorProperty.name: CompressorType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The compression algorithm used to compress binary data (appended mode only).
